channel.title: Protoc on dumb by default
channel.description: Recent content in Protoc on dumb by default

item.title: (Bit)Torrent as File Transfer
item.description: Before I begin I might need to address that: I do not endorse the act and practice of piracy. This post is not intended to be used as a tutorial or a guide, merely as a personal documentation on alternative use of BitTorrent and BitTorrent protocol as file transfer tool.
